text: 18.37 Jon 8.47, 1 Ti 6.13, 1 Jo 3.19, 4.6 Agek Paylat agak, Anɨb ak nad bɨnonɨm olap akaŋ agak? Agek Jisas pen agak, Nɨm nak ke apan ak agak. Pen ami yɨp tɨkek, yad takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak agñɨnɨg lum awl ownek agak. Binɨb takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak dɨnɨgun agɨl nepal okok, takaw yad ak nɨŋɨd dɨpal agak.
